charts.name: ttoday
charts.csql: SELECT Count(tid) AS 'noTw' FROM tweets WHERE left(created,10)=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')
charts.title: Tweets Today

charts.name: tdat
charts.csql: SELECT DayName(left(created,10)) AS Day, count(tid) AS noTweets FROM tweets WHERE left(created,10)<=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')AND left(created,10)>DATE_FORMAT(date_add(curdate(),INTERVAL -7 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP By DayName(left(created,10)) ORDER BY Dayofweek(left(created,10))
charts.title: Tweets By Day

charts.name: bnonb
charts.csql: SELECT case when blog = 1 THEN 'Blogger' ELSE 'Non-Blogger' END AS 'Blogger', count(blog) FROM tweets WHERE left(created,10)=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY Blog
charts.title: Blogger vs. Non-Blogger
